timeline.bodyText: Isn't this PR for a POST endpoint?
timeline.author: saminguyen

replies.bodyText:
Yes this is a POST endpoint.
ActiveUserFilter is used only in participant-manager-service , moved this from common-service to participant-manager-service as part of PR #626 review comment fix.
replies.author: madhurya-btc
